title: Where are you planning to invest in Pune? (ram mankar)
text: By ram mankar Jul 18, 2015 Pune's real estate market is growing with time and is providing multiple options for the property seekers who are willing to invest in real estate for great return on investments few years down the lane. The real estate investment is something that majority of the home buyers are showing interest at present. This is due to the fact that investments in property prove to be dependable and profitable in the long run. Initially, the home buying market was limited to the buyers from middle-aged and old age groups, but, at present, the real estate industry has its new set of buyers and investors, i.e. the younger generations. The age group of 25-35 is now actively investing in the real estate industry for good returns.Pune is not only becoming a preferred option for buying first homes but is also attracting investors and for variety of second home options. Other than young people who are working professionals searching for new homes in the city, Pune is also becoming a preferred destination or second home buyers among the middle-aged and old age groups. The builders and developers of the city are continuously involved in constructing, luxurious and comfortable residential projects in Pune that give the potential home buyers plenty of options to choose from. Also, these properties vary in aspects such as the built-up area, the locality, the price range, the configuration type and the amenities along with these projects. If we look into the new localities in the city, the investors have a great lookout as the ongoing projects in Pune are grabbing eyeballs of many investors from overseas. The builders are establishing a wide range of residential properties in Pune where the buyers can avail some exciting new amenities that reflect world class infrastructure and specifications to add to the luxurious lifestyle of the buyers. "I had explored almost 150 completed and ongoing projects in Pune before finalizing a property for investment purpose and that much of research surely did not go waste as my parents too found a second home in the city within just one month of time frame." Says Kashyap Salunkhe, a newly relocated IT professional.If you plan to relocate to the city, you can explore some of the ongoing projects by builders like Ram India Group, which have recently launched their new projects namely, Livogue and Green Hive located in Hadapsar and Phursungi respectively. However, if you are in search of property for investment, there are many other options provided by the same builder in other parts of the city as well. About the Author A property dealer by profession, writing is his hobby. Through his writings, he brings out the pros and cons of investing in real estate projects across the country. He has also been writing frequently about the residential projects in Pune and ongoing projects in Pune . Rating:
